hi! welcome to my website

i'm stephanie wan, a freshman at yale university

i like CS (competitive programming, AI, cybersecurity), science, math, history, philosophy, and art.

i used to go to lexington high school, where i was the captain of the lexmacs (lexington mathematical computer science) and science olympiad clubs (events: disease detectives/epidemiology, experimental design, ecology, robot tour). we won states my senior year (first win since 2025, Corteva Enterprise Award for highest placing new team at Nationals)! i was also the head coach for the jonas clarke middle school science olympiad club (3x state champion streak!)
